Name: Lone Pirate VR
About the game: In Lone Pirate VR you play as a pirate and attack other ships to plunder the most gold you can before your ship sinks. Compete in the global leaderboard to be the best pirate in the world! Features: No artificial locomotion/Teleportation, only Room-Scale Classic and Rogue Shark gamemodes Online 6 player Free for All multiplayer Steam Leaderboards A pirate soundtrack
